_description: Rainy Night Theme - Dark, moody visual styling with glass effects and warm accent colors
name: Rainy Night

background._purpose: Input bar transparency and glass blur effect
background._colorNote: Controls input bar transparency. Change 0.85 to 0.9 = less see-through, 0.7 = more see-through. Safe range: 0.1-1.0
background._blurNote: Glass blur effect behind input bar. Change 20px to 30px = more blur, 10px = less blur. Range: 5px-50px

border._purpose: Input bar border styling with gradient glow
border._borderNote: Gradient creates subtle glowing border effect. Change 0.3 to 0.5 = brighter glow

shadow._purpose: Input bar depth and lighting effects
shadow._shadowNote: Outer shadow for depth, inner shadow for subtle bottom highlight. Change 0.4 to 0.6 = darker shadow

filePreviewZone._backgroundNote: Subtle highlight to distinguish file area. Change 0.1 to 0.15 = more prominent file zone

filePreview._fileNote: Dark background makes file previews stand out. Change 0.3 to 0.4 = darker file cards

removeButton._removeNote: Red X button. Change 0.8 to 0.6 = more transparent, 1.0 = always solid red

typography._textColorNote: Warm off-white text color. Change #DFD0B8 to #FFFFFF = pure white, #E0C9A6 = warmer tone
typography._placeholderNote: Placeholder text transparency. Change 0.6 to 0.8 = more visible placeholder

icon._iconNote: Plus icon color. Change 0.7 to 1.0 = fully visible icon

plusButton._hoverNote: Hover highlight. Change 0.1 to 0.2 = brighter hover effect

chevron._chevronNote: Arrow color. Change 0.5 to 0.8 = more visible arrows

statusIndicator._statusNote: Bright green with glow. Change #00ff00 to #22ff22 = softer green

menu._menuNote: Darker than input bar for hierarchy. Change 0.9 to 0.95 = less transparent dropdown

item._itemNote: Text becomes fully opaque when selected. Change 0.15 to 0.2 = brighter selection

sectionHeader._headerNote: Section headers are brighter than items. Change 0.9 to 1.0 = pure white headers

stencils._comment: Horizontal lines extending from input bar
stencils._purpose: Visual extension lines that frame the input bar

gradient._gradientNote: Fades from screen edges toward input bar. Change 0.5 to 0.7 = brighter connection to input bar

link._linkNote: Blue accent color for navigation links. Change #007acc to #0099ff = brighter blue

tagline._taglineNote: Muted text for supplementary info. Change 0.7 to 0.9 = more prominent tagline

globalBody._bodyNote: Dark page background. Change #222831 to #1a1a1a = darker, #2a3440 = lighter
